1516870.name: Eshina Princess Cultivator
1516870.description:
In Eshina Princess Cultivator the player fills the role of Eleora Eshina's caretaker, whom is destined to rule hegemonic power of the Sorbia continent, the Imperial Realm of Ekaria. You will be directing her growth as you see fit until she is ready to ascend to the throne. But will she be ready?

GAME FEATURES

  • [Protecting] Eleora's safety must be ensured, but don't make her feel constrained.

  • [Socializing] Eleora needs to have basic social skills if she is to talk to her people.

  • [Training] Eleora may need to train her body, or magical prowess to fight if need be.

  • [Educating] Eleora requires education in statesmanship and others if she is to lead.

  • [Feeding] Eleora must consume the correct amount of nutrition and healthy foods.

  • [Playing] Eleora could have an allotment of play time so she isn't stressed out.

  • [Adventuring] Eleora must know and embrace the world outside her gilded palace.

    And finally...

  • [Governing] Once Eleora is of age, her abilities will be put to the test as Empress.
